name: Sparkling Fall Sangria
description: This wild cocktail combines champagne, sparkling wine, and prosecco.

ingredients.ingredient: Pears, Red Apples, Cinnamon Sticks, Star Anise

directions: Drop fruits and cinnamon sticks into base of pitcher and pour over amaretto and cinnamon whiskey.
Add apple cider, followed by champagne and sparkling drink. Stir well.
